messages.message: Do we have plans to allow copying on Fields? Particularly for List data types, it is very time consuming to copy the prompt content to create a new field. The example I am using here is to pull a table of data about properties from a document, and then I add up different rows of that table depending on the field I need (hence 95% of the prompts are the same)
nothing about copying fields directly... but could this be solved using derived fields? @pauline.comising do you have an idea

Oh ya, this sounds like a good use case for non-extraction fields, which are fields that don't require extraction from documents and are instead created from other fields. In your case, you could create a field that extracts the table and then create non-extraction fields that all reference this field and adds up rows.
